prescription_medications.description: Benzodiazepine for alleviating anxiety and panic disorders.

prescription_medications.name: Lisinopril
prescription_medications.description: Relaxes blood vessels, lowering blood pressure and reducing heart workload.

prescription_medications.name: Omeprazole
prescription_medications.usage: Proton pump inhibitor for acid reflux
prescription_medications.description: Reduces stomach acid production, relieving acid reflux symptoms.

prescription_medications.name: Levothyroxine
prescription_medications.description: Replaces or supplements thyroid hormones for treating hypothyroidism.

prescription_medications.description: Reduces inflammation and suppresses the immune system for various conditions.

prescription_medications.name: Sertraline
prescription_medications.description: SSRI that balances neurotransmitters, alleviating depression and anxiety.

prescription_medications.name: Amlodipine
prescription_medications.description: Relaxes blood vessels, improving blood flow and reducing blood pressure.

otc_medications.name: Diphenhydramine

otc_medications.name: Loperamide

otc_medications.description: Soothes stomach discomfort, reduces diarrhea, and relieves indigestion.

otc_medications.name: Aspirin

otc_medications.name: Famotidine
otc_medications.description: Reduces stomach acid production, relieving acid reflux and indigestion.

health_supplements.name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
health_supplements.description: Omega-3 fatty acids support heart health and cognitive function.

health_supplements.name: Calcium
health_supplements.description: Crucial for bone strength and overall skeletal health.

health_supplements.name: Iron
health_supplements.description: Essential for hemoglobin formation and preventing iron-deficiency anemia.

health_supplements.name: Vitamin C
health_supplements.description: Antioxidant supporting the immune system and aiding in collagen formation.

health_supplements.name: Magnesium
health_supplements.description: Essential for muscle and nerve function, maintaining a healthy heart rhythm.

health_supplements.name: Probiotics
health_supplements.description: Beneficial bacteria supporting digestive health and gut microflora balance.

health_supplements.name: Coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10)
health_supplements.description: Antioxidant supporting cellular energy production and cardiovascular health.

health_supplements.name: Folic Acid
health_supplements.usage: Essential for cell division and DNA synthesis
health_supplements.description: Important for proper cell division and preventing neural tube defects during pregnancy.

first_aid_supplies.name: Band-Aid Adhesive Bandages
first_aid_supplies.description: Sterile strips that protect minor wounds and cuts, promoting healing.

first_aid_supplies.name: Hydrogen Peroxide
first_aid_supplies.description: Mild antiseptic that cleans and disinfects wounds, helping prevent infection.

first_aid_supplies.name: Ace Bandage
first_aid_supplies.description: Provides compression and support for sprains and strains, promoting healing and reducing swelling.

first_aid_supplies.name: Tweezers

first_aid_supplies.name: Thermometer
first_aid_supplies.description: Accurately measures body temperature, aiding in monitoring and managing fever.

first_aid_supplies.name: Antiseptic Wipes
first_aid_supplies.usage: Disinfecting wipes for cuts and scrapes
first_aid_supplies.description: Convenient for cleaning and disinfecting minor cuts and scrapes.

first_aid_supplies.name: Gauze Pads
first_aid_supplies.description: Provides a sterile covering for wounds, aiding in wound care and preventing infection.

first_aid_supplies.name: Medical Tape
first_aid_supplies.description: Hypoallergenic tape that adheres securely to the skin, keeping bandages in place during movement.

first_aid_supplies.name: Pain Relief Cream (e.g., Bengay)
first_aid_supplies.description: Provides localized relief for sore muscles and joints through topical application.

first_aid_supplies.name: Instant Cold Pack
first_aid_supplies.description: Provides quick cold therapy, reducing swelling and alleviating pain from injuries.

chronic_disease_management.name: Insulin (e.g., Humalog)
chronic_disease_management.description: Regulates blood sugar levels in individuals with diabetes, helping control the condition.

chronic_disease_management.name: Losartan
chronic_disease_management.usage: Angiotensin II receptor blocker for hypertension
chronic_disease_management.description: Relaxes blood vessels, lowering blood pressure and reducing the risk of stroke and heart attack.

chronic_disease_management.name: Albuterol Inhaler
chronic_disease_management.description: Provides quick relief from bronchoconstriction in asthma, promoting easier breathing.

chronic_disease_management.name: Warfarin
chronic_disease_management.description: Prevents blood clots by interfering with the clotting process, reducing the risk of strokes and thromboembolism.

chronic_disease_management.name: Methotrexate
chronic_disease_management.description: Treats autoimmune conditions like rheumatoid arthritis by suppressing the immune system's overactivity.

chronic_disease_management.name: Enalapril
chronic_disease_management.description: Improves heart function and reduces strain on the heart, benefiting individuals with heart failure.

chronic_disease_management.name: Levodopa/Carbidopa (Sinemet)
chronic_disease_management.description: Improves motor symptoms in Parkinson's disease by increasing dopamine levels in the brain.

chronic_disease_management.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
chronic_disease_management.description: Increases urine production, reducing fluid retention and lowering blood pressure.

chronic_disease_management.name: Digoxin
chronic_disease_management.description: Strengthens heart contractions, improving heart function in conditions like heart failure and atrial fibrillation.

chronic_disease_management.name: Cyclosporine
chronic_disease_management.description: Suppresses the immune system to prevent rejection of transplanted organs.
